sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { FirebaseContext, AuthContext } from '../../store/Context' import Heart from '../../assets/Heart'; import './Post.css'; import { getFirestore, getDocs, collection } from 'firebase/firestore' import { PostContext } from '../../store/postContext'; import R15 from '../../public/Images/R15V3.jpg' import Minicooper from '../../public/Images/6c27cb67c759270fc2189b12cb13285b.jpg' import BMW from '../../public/Images/bmw-g310r-left-side-view0.webp' import Thar from '../../public/Images/Thar_1601615282959_1601615288316.webp' import Duke from '../../public/Images/4b2860d4827723f18c4c6e23f5856778.jpg' function Posts() { const { firebaseApp } = useContext(FirebaseContext) const { User } = useContext(AuthContext) const { setPostDetails } = useContext(PostContext) const [Products, setProducts] = useState([]) const fireStore = getFirestore(firebaseApp) const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const querySnapshot = await getDocs(collection(fireStore, 'products')); const productData = querySnapshot.docs.map((doc) => ({ id: doc.id, data: doc.data() })); console.log(productData); setProducts(productData); }; fetchData(); }, [fireStore]); const handleViewPost = (data) => { setPostDetails(data) navigate('/view') } return (
Quick Menu View more
{Products.map((product) =>
handleViewPost(product.data) : null}>

₹ {product.data.Price}

{product.data.Category}

{product.data.Name}

{/* {setPostDetails(product.data)} */} { console.log(product.data)} {product.data.createdAt}
)}
Fresh recommendations

₹ 250000

Two Wheeler

YAMAHA R15V3

Tue oct 20 2023

₹ 4200000

Car

Mini Cooper

Wed oct 25 2023

₹ 200000

Two Wheeler

2023 BMW G 310

Fri Nov 10 2023

₹ 900000

Car

Mahindra Thar 2020

Tue Nov 09 2023

₹ 120000

Car

2021 KTM Duke 200

Mon Nov 05 2023
); } export default Posts;
